article_node.title: Hotel Workers’ Union Fights “Resort Fee Ripoff,” Launches Website to Help Guests Avoid Unfair Fees at Curator Collection hotels
article_node.summary: UNITE HERE, the hotel workers' union, has launched a website to help guests avoid resort fees at Curator Collection hotels, which are known for charging mandatory fees for services that may not be desired. The website, CuratorCollectionCon.org, informs travelers about the prevalence of these fees, which average $40 per night and can exceed $100 at some properties. It also provides tools such as a refund letter template and information on consumer rights, highlighting the deceptive nature of these charges.
